thread.title: Rita Ora Needs a Strong Drink to Talk About Calvin Harris and Taylor Swift
thread.title_full: Rita Ora Needs a Strong Drink to Talk About Calvin Harris and Taylor Swift

title: Rita Ora Needs a Strong Drink to Talk About Calvin Harris and Taylor Swift
text: Rita Ora Needs a Strong Drink to Talk About Calvin Harris and Taylor Swift Most Popular By Alyssa Bailey Feb 10, 2017 Before there was Calvin Harris and Taylor Swift , there was Calvin Harris and Rita Ora. Their breakup was not pretty: He tweeted the announcement before she even knew they were going public with it ( Ora reportedly had hoped to reconcile ). "At the time, I just wanted to crawl in my bed and die," she told Wonderland magazine in November 2015 . "But I got out of it the other side. I'm surviving." With Harris in February 2014. Getty Advertisement - Continue Reading Below With another year behind Ora, Andy Cohen figured he could ask the singer how she felt about Harris and his last girlfriend, Taylor Swiftâ€”particularly Harris's nuclear "This Is What You Came For" takedown of her, post-breakup, on Twitter . "Can we not go there right now? Are we really doing this? Is this bring Rita's whole past to the TV ?" she exclaimed to Cohen, laughing. "Drew, help me please! Help me! Give me a drink, a strong one!" Most Popular Then Ora got serious and tackled Cohen's question diplomatically. "We're good friends," she said of Harris. "The thing is, I don't keep grudges with anybody. Everybody uses social media how they want. I choose not to so that's just my personal way to express myself, but everyone does their own thing." Peak Tayvin Yes, it was weird seeing Swift and Harris in magazines, but Ora wasn't really looking. "I don't really read magazines anymore that much," she said. "But to be honest, I think it's kind of like yeah, obviously a usual breakup you don't really see your ex all over the place. But you know, you just kind of take it with a pinch of salt and keep going with your own life and just make the most of what you are, you know what I mean?" Then Cohen asked whether Ora had dated Zayn Malik . That's where she hit her openness limit: More from ELLE:
